entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening and ending overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
